special_text:
If a creature entering under you control causes an ability to trigger, you may pay [-1]. Whenever you do, copy that ability. You may choose new targets for the copy.
[+1]: Exile target creature. Return that card to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step. If you don't control it, it enters with a stun counter.
[-2]: Draw a card and gain 2 life.
